heading: Parodies.
general-note: Here are entered collections of parodies in several languages or of several literatures, in the English language, or of English and American literature. Collections in other languages or of other literatures are entered under. Parodies. qualified by language or nationality, e.g.. Parodies, French.. Works on the literary form of humorous or satirical imitation of a serious piece of literature are entered under. Parody..
